oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Untersuchungen von Traubensaft aus den Jahren 2007-2010 von unterschiedlichen Produktionssystemen mit drei Bildschaffenden Methoden
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fritz, Jürgen
Meißner, Georg
Athmann, Miriam
Köpke, Ulrich
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 33 encoded grape samples from 2007-2010 were taken from a long-term field trial on the comparison of different organic and conventional production systems at Geisenheim, Germany. The samples were examined with the image forming methods biocrystallization, capillary dynamolysis and circular chromatography. The pictures of the encoded samples were i. differentiated and ii. characterised. The origin of 31 out of 33 encoded samples derived from ‘conventional’, ‘bio-organic’, ‘bio-dynamic‘ production was determined with highest accuracy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Fritz, Jürgen; Meißner, Georg; Athmann, Miriam and Köpke, Ulrich (2013) Untersuchungen von Traubensaft aus den Jahren 2007-2010 von unterschiedlichen Produktionssystemen mit drei Bildschaffenden Methoden. Paper at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
